title: Blog features
body:
I've made a lot of changes to this blog over the last couple days, so I thought I'd take a brief moment to point some of them out.

+ On the side, you'll notice a red bar at the top that says "Cinema 24 | blog", this is the home button. It follows you everywhere you go and will always take you back to the homepage when clicked.

+ Below the [ about ] box, you'll see a box titled [ links ]... these are links that I have found to be relevant and/or useful when it comes to starting one's own theater.

+ The red bar below the [ links ] box is the new guestbook. So far, I've been the only person to sign it... and that's sad. Really, really sad.

+ Below the guestbook bar is the [ blogs ] box, which contains a small list of blogs that I frequent.

+ Below the [ blogs ] box is the [ quote ] box. The quotes cycle through at random, but if you'd like to see them all, you can click on the...

+ "Quote | archive" bar. I'll be adding new quotes from time to time.

+ Below the [ previous ] and [ archive ] boxes is the "Donate | today" bar, which is one and the same with the [ shameless ploy ] box. I won't go into detail about these boxes, because they embarass me.

+ Sandwiched between the shameless ploy boxes, you'll find the [ stats ] box. I plan to add more stats one day, so keep your eyes peeled.

That's it. Now I'm off to write the real post for today...

[UPDATE] - All of this is null now, as the layout for this blog has been changed several times.
author: Dan
